titles.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park Act of 2014
To redesignate the Martin Luther King, Junior, National Historic Site in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: 9/17/2014--Introduced. Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park Act of 2014 - Redesignates the Martin Luther King, Junior, National Historic Site in the state of Georgia as the "Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park." Replaces the current boundary map with an updated map dated April 2009.
